704591f-a.folder: Furman Street & Doughty Street, Brooklyn, NY
704591f-a.text:
Furman Street, north from Doughty to Fulton Streets, showing the old Fulton Street Elevated station. This was the first Brooklyn stop from manhattan via the Brooklyn Bridge. It has long been abandoned.
April 1, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
